name: torch
description: Its a stick with some cloth and fuel that burns for providing light.

name: armor
description: Its a suit of protective armor.

name: book
description: Its a diary that says something about a key under a pillow.

name: shield
description: A sturdy metal shield, could be useful for defending yourself.

name: sword
description: A pointy metal sword, could be useful for stabbing something.

name: bow
description: A large oak bow, shoots arrows.

name: arrows
description: Metal tipped arrows to be shot with a bow.

name: lever
description: A wooden lever, looks like it was taken off something.

name: mead
description: Some strong smelling mead, would make for a good party.

name: bread
description: Some old mouldy bread, I probably would not eat it.

name: turkey
description: Its been here a while, its pretty much turkey jerky now.

name: knife
description: A rusty metal dagger with a wooden handle.

name: potion
description: A strange liquid that restores vitality.

name: ring
description: A ring filled with magic powers.
